name: Klondike Solitaire 2
description:
A superb version of your favorite Klondike solitaire game. Universal app with several super legible card decks.

FEATURES
High scores and statistics.
Choice of card decks and backgrounds.
Highly legible design.
Standard game rules.
Instructions.
Optimized retina display graphics.
Simple game play.
Includes both three card and single card versions.
